story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: That outfit looks great on you, Acerola.
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh, Acerola and Lana! I thought that was you!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: You two are wearing outfits for the festival, right?
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_0700_10: And next to you two are...
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
So, although they’re not the Alolan
guardian deities...
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_0900_10: all four of the tapu are here in one spot!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: Wow! I can’t believe this is happening!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1100_10: All of them will lend us their strength!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
We’re supposed to wear this outfit during the
festival on Pasio, right?
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I want to wear this and enjoy the festival with
Tapu Bulu!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1500_10: In order to do that, we need to protect Pasio!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Pasio is an important island for us—just as
important as our home, Alola!
story_alola_02_05000/2401_1001_1900_10: Let’s go—with the four guardian deities!
